news.title: How will Australia’s under-16s social media ban be enforced, and which platforms will be exempt?
news.summary: Aussies using a range of social media platforms including Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, Snapchat and X will need to have their age checked to ensure they’re 16 or older. No prescribed avenue for social media companies to check users’ ages, but options include facial estimation technology and matching photos with ID.

news.title: Anger grows in China over reports of online groups sharing explicit photos of women
news.summary: Chinese media said more than 100,000 were members of Telegram group. Group shared pictures taken without consent, including sexually explicit ones.

news.title: The best rice cookers in the UK for gloriously fluffy grains at home: nine tried and tested favourites
news.summary: Most Britons cook and eat rice at least a few times a week. While it may seem a simple thing to cook, it can be surprisingly difficult to get it right. Different rice grains have different cook times, different rates of absorption and varying starch levels.
